mapper.select: SELECT user_id FROM chat_member WHERE chat_idx = #{chat_idx}
SELECT * FROM chat_msg WHERE chat_idx = #{chat_idx} ORDER BY reg_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat (chat_name, avatar, archived, last_msg, last_time, last_active) VALUES (#{chat_name}, #{avatar}, #{archived}, #{last_msg}, #{last_time}, #{last_active})
INSERT INTO chat_member (chat_idx, user_id, unread) VALUES (#{param1}, #{param2}, 0)
INSERT INTO chat_msg (chat_idx, user_id, content, msg_type, reg_date, is_read) VALUES (#{chat_idx}, #{user_id}, #{content}, #{msg_type}, NOW(), #{is_read})
INSERT INTO chat_file (msg_idx, name, url, size, uploaded_at, expire_at) VALUES (#{msg_idx}, #{name}, #{url}, #{size}, #{uploaded_at}, #{expire_at})
